text: Ust, ki pesopesi [ʙoroni] rahmatas ʙodhoro ʙasoratʙaxs mefiristad, to aʙrhoi sanginʙorro [ʙar dus] kasand [va] onro ʙa suji zamini [xusku] murda mefiristem,on goh ʙar on [sarzamin] oʙ furu meʙorem va [az ʙarakati] on [oʙ] har guna mevae ʙarmeovarem. Ba in son, murdagonro [niz az qaʙr] xoric mesozem, ʙosad, ki pand gired
